product_name: Igloo Monster Glide Cooler - 110 qt. - Special Buy
long_description: Ready for a week of campsite cooking or a big BBQ at the park, the 110 qt. Igloo Monster Glide wheeled cooler makes it easy to lift and roll your movable feast thanks to a patented handle. Pack the generous 110 qt. (104L) capacity full of provisions for family outings, and use the horizontal telescoping aluminum handle to easily lift and roll cooler. Ultratherm(TM) foam in body and lid offer keeps contents cold for an estimated 5 days (results may vary based on conditions). The 110 qt. Igloo Monster Glide wheeled cooler features a threaded drain plug for simple draining and a fish keeper scale to measure your catch. Durable stainless-steel latches, hinges and lid straps; oversize soft-ride rally wheels for easy transport and a smooth ride; cushioned grip handle. Special buy.
short_description: Ready for a week of campsite cooking or a big BBQ at the park, the 110 qt. Igloo Monster Glide wheeled cooler makes it easy to lift and roll your movable feast thanks to a patented handle.
